mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bg_participant (participant_name, phone, email, participant_role, club_name, gender, birth_date, skill_level, emergency_contact) VALUES (#{participantName}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{participantRole}, #{clubName}, #{gender}, #{birthDate}, #{skillLevel}, #{emergencyContact})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM bg_event_participant WHERE event_id = #{eventId} AND participant_id = #{participantId}
